library(knitr)
library(rmdformats)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(here)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
## Global options
options(max.print="75")

	             cache=TRUE,
               prompt=FALSE,
               tidy=TRUE,
               comment=NA,
               message=FALSE,
               warning=FALSE)
opts_knit$set(width=75)
